thread.title: Shah Rukh Khan Is Set To Do A Cameo In Salman Khan's Upcoming Film, Tubelight, And Here's The Reason Why
thread.title_full: Shah Rukh Khan Is Set To Do A Cameo In Salman Khan's Upcoming Film, Tubelight, And Here's The Reason Why

title: Shah Rukh Khan Is Set To Do A Cameo In Salman Khan's Upcoming Film, Tubelight, And Here's The Reason Why
text:
facebook 117 SHARES 
The Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan jodi was popularised by Karan Arjun , two brothers who are inseparable even by death. We loved the two Khans together, and have never since been disappointed watching them on the big screen. 
The two are all set to reunite in Salman Khan's upcoming film, Tubelight . Recently, SRK gave the statement, "Yes, I am doing a special role in the film. Salman's a dear friend, and I have known Kabir since his college days. So, I am doing it out of love for them." 
We know that SRK and Sallu bhai share a special bond. But, if you're wondering how the kind Khan knows Kabir, he told BT in a recent interview that Kabir was Gauri Khan's classmate, and Shah Rukh would often go to their school to teach them theatre. 
Fraternising, more power to you. Picture Credits: TOI
